title: Provide better feedback when machines are launching

content.raw:
Because this process takes quite some time, users in the first round of testing expressed confusion over the state of the machines. The indicator lights for Package and Launch aren't the same, and it's unclear when everything is ready to go.

We should discuss the option of adding "Launching, please wait..." and "Ready" text and perhaps removing one of the indicator lights. Do the users  need to know about the two indicator lights?
